mapper.insert: insert into dy_yp_blood_sugar (sid, batch_id, value, record_dt, record_time, param_code, record_origin, level, remark, is_valid, insert_dt, modify_dt, sensor_no, machine_no ,imei) values (#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordDt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paramCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordOrigin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{insertDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sensorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{machineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{imei}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE is_valid = 1,modify_dt = now(),machine_no = values(machine_no) ,imei = values(imei)

mapper.select: select sid, batch_id, value, record_dt, record_time, param_code, record_origin, level, remark, is_valid, insert_dt, modify_dt, sensor_no, machine_no from dy_yp_blood_sugar t where t.is_valid = 1 and sensor_no = #{sensorNo} order by record_dt desc limit 1

select sid, batch_id, value, record_dt, record_time, param_code, record_origin, level, remark, is_valid, insert_dt, modify_dt, sensor_no, machine_no from dy_yp_blood_sugar t where t.is_valid = 1 and sid = #{sid} order by record_time desc

select sid, batch_id, value, record_dt, record_time, param_code, record_origin, level, remark, is_valid, insert_dt, modify_dt, sensor_no, machine_no from dy_yp_blood_sugar t where t.is_valid = 1 and sensor_no = #{sensorNo} order by record_dt ASC limit 1

select sid, batch_id, value, record_dt, record_time, param_code, record_origin, level, remark, is_valid, insert_dt, modify_dt, sensor_no, machine_no from dy_yp_blood_sugar t where t.is_valid = 1 and imei = #{imei} order by record_time desc limit 1

select sid, batch_id, `value`, record_dt, record_time, param_code, record_origin, level, remark, is_valid, insert_dt, modify_dt, sensor_no, machine_no from dy_yp_blood_sugar t where t.is_valid = 1 and sensor_no = #{sensorNo} and insert_dt between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by record_time desc
select distinct record_dt from DY_YP_BLOOD_SUGAR where sensor_no=#{sensorNo}
select record_time from DY_YP_BLOOD_SUGAR where sensor_no=#{sensorNo} order by record_time limit 1
